casebody.data:
No. 10-76. Goodyear Luxembourg Tires, S.A., et al., Petitioners v. Edgar D. Brown, et ux., Co-Administrators of the Estate of Julian David Brown, et al. 561 U.S. 1058, 131 S. Ct. 63,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1152,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5750. September 28, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of North Carolina granted, and the case is to be argued in tandem with No. 09-1343, J. McIntyre Machinery, Ltd. v. Nicastro et ux., supra.

Same case below, 199 N.C. App. 50, 681 S.E.2d 382.
